definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
lit. to throw a stone and see it sink without trace in the sea (idiom)/fig. to elicit no response
lit. to fish a needle from the sea/to find a needle in a haystack (idiom)
to disappear like a stone dropped into the sea/to vanish forever without trace

sentences.english: I was dancing through green waves of grass like the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我在草地里如大海般的绿浪中起舞。

sentences.english: Although De Gang can blame the sea aloud, but he is same however ashamed is right Chun Yan.
sentences.chinese: 尽管德纲可以大声责备大海，但他却一样愧对春颜。

sentences.english: The great auk is an extinct bird.
sentences.chinese: 大海雀是种灭绝的鸟类。

sentences.english: Anumber of small streams converge into avast ocean.
Sometimes trying to find something on the worldwide web is like trying to find a needle in a haystack.
sentences.chinese: 有时候在互联网上找东西就和大海捞针一样难。

sentences.english: Birds soar in the sky while fishes roam in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿翱翔天空，鱼儿遨游大海。

sentences.english: Till a' the seas gang dry.
This part of the underground tunnel leads to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 地下隧道的这部分通向大海。

sentences.english: An old man, a shabby boat and a vast sea.
sentences.chinese: 一个老人，一只破旧的船与一片茫茫大海。

sentences.english: It is supposed to look like a sunset or sunrise with clouds over water.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画作看起来就像是大海之上云雾萦绕的日出日落。

sentences.english: Five million barrels of oil gushed into the ocean over 86 straight days.
sentences.chinese: 约有5百万桶石油在足足86天内泄入大海。

sentences.english: Swim in the ocean. Plant a garden.
sentences.chinese: 在大海里面游泳，建一个花园。

sentences.english: The sweet love story that is older than the sea.
sentences.chinese: 甜蜜的爱情故事悠久于大海。

sentences.english: Life just like an ocean, not always calm maybe paradises sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 生活就像大海不总是风平浪静也有惊涛骇浪时。

sentences.english: The boat wallowed helplessly in the stormy sea.
sentences.chinese: 大海中无力地颠簸行驶。

sentences.english: The sea in the sails, call your motivate you struggled to climb the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 大海在召唤你扬帆远航，高山在激励你奋力攀登。

definition: spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
dry land (as opposed to the sea)
